Chile: Founding of Valdivia. Lautaro, after six years' imprisonment by the Spanish, escapes and teaches his people military strategy, including riding horses.
India: Guru Amar Das becomes third Guru of Sikhs.
Malta: Construction of Fort Saint Michael, in Senglea.
Fearing further razzias by Turks and Barbary corsairs, one thousand Maltese flee Malta, seeking refuge in Sicily.
Russia: Siege of Kazan (1552): Muscovite armed forces arrived at Kazan.
Siege of Kazan (1552): The Muscovite army breached the walls of Kazan.
Siege of Kazan (1552): The civilian population of Kazan was massacred, the city occupied.
